verbose_text: In the Tg2576 mouse model for AD amyloidosis, PPARgamma agonists restore presynaptic function and short-term synaptic plasticity at mPP to DG granule neuron synapses and rescue ERK signaling pathways that subserve hippocampus dependent cognition.
evidence: PPARgamma agonists restore presynaptic function and short-term synaptic plasticity at mPP to DG
